评论概述: Comfortable and Versatile Cargo Pants - Great for Active Men!
评论详情: I recently purchased the Men's Casual Cargo Pants and overall, I'm satisfied with the product. Here's what I like:  - True to size: Ordered M and fits perfectly - Comfortable fit: Waist drawstring ensures a secure and comfortable fit - Large pockets: Ample storage for essentials - Breathable material: Polyester fabric is flexible, wear-resistant, and allows for airflow - Versatile: Suitable for gym, hiking, trekking, traveling, or running errands - Pairable: Can be worn with a shirt or sweatshirt for a casual look  However, I'm not a big fan of the material. While it's breathable and flexible, it's not the most premium feel.  Would I recommend it? Yes, for the price, these cargo pants offer great value. They're perfect for active men who need a comfortable and versatile piece for various activities. Just don't expect high-end material quality.

I wanted to like these pants. I like the number of pockets that it comes with, I like the look, and I like the color of the pants. Now the problems - I'm not too fond of the material. The pants feel like they are made out of a thinner material, and feel more like pajama pants than pants that you would wear outside the house. Because of the waist sizes, the length of the pants are LONG if you have a "larger" waist. The ankles actually have draw strings if you need to hike up the bottom of your pants, but then you have baggier pants that you're sinching up so the bottom of your pants don't drag on the ground. They don't fit great. I wish they were sized like jeans are - length and inseam instead of just the S-M-L-XL-XXL sizes they offer.

Loose fitting and light weight, these are great for high school students. My son really likes them as they have a draw string instead of a buckle. The snaps on the pocket are decorative, they don’t snap onto anything.
Thes cargo pants are versatile. You can dress them up or dress them down. My son has sensory issues so they are light and soft. He loves them.
Soft, lightweight material. True to size/color. Easy to wash.

I don't like the fabric, first off. Just has a scratchy polyester feel, to me. I want it a little smoother to the touch. Feels hot, too. Like it's something you wear in colder(ish) weather. Would like belt loops, to have the option. Not crazy about the little snap flaps on the pockets. Unless you keep them buttoned, they just kinda flap around. Not liking the little elastic drawstrings that can get hooked on stuff, either. I'm just gonna call it 3 stars.
Nive cargo pants fit well. Comfortable

评论概述: Versatile and Comfortable Men's Casual Pants
评论详情: These Men's Casual Cargo Pants offer a perfect blend of style and functionality. The drawstring elastic waist provides a customized fit, making them incredibly comfortable for all-day wear. The parachute-style design adds a modern touch, while the cargo pockets are practical for carrying essentials during hikes or casual outings. The material is durable yet breathable, making these pants suitable for a variety of activities, from jogging to casual lounging. Overall, these joggers are a great addition to any wardrobe, offering both versatility and comfort.

I gave these their trial run hiking the peak of the mountain I live on just yesterday. It was quite hot, and the light fabric of these cargo pants kept me feeling cool the whole way. The fabric is incredibly light, yet tough enough to scramble over the jagged rocks at the peak. They got quite wet below the knee and dried out very quickly while eating lunch on a sunny rock. They have ample storage pockets, on the legs, and in the normal spots which is quite handy for hauling extra goodies. My favorite feature is the drawstring waist though. It can be adjusted to the weight of what you may be carrying, which is a BIG plus for me. They're perfect for just hanging out too, and look great !!

These pants fit as expected and advertised. They are definitely true to size for the waist band and are not tight in the leg/thigh area like some pants are. They are very comfortable and flowy, not too tight in any spot. They have kept their size after washing and drying.

These cargo pants are very comfortable and stylish. The pockets are deep and easy to get in and out of. I like the material because it feels like it can be jean material, but it’s actually a wick material, which is perfect for hot weather.

I got these for my husband to use as work pants, but the are so nice that I ordered a pair for my son for school already. They are lightweight, making them perfect for spring, fall, and even summer. My son doesn't like button pants, so the elastic waist is perfect for him. My husband has been living in his since they arrived almost a week ago. He uses them when doing lawn work and while working on our car. He said the material is very comfortable, and even kind of repels water. They are quite baggy and do run a bit big. He normally orders an XL in pants like these, but would have been fine in large with this pair. My son typically wears a men's medium in sweat pants so I ordered him a small in these and they fit great. The quality and comfort of these make them an all-around great choice for casual pants that can be dressed up or down.

评论概述: Not parachute pants, but comfy enough
评论详情: These are not parachute pants, at least not as I knew them in the 80's.  These are barely pants - definitely no as thick as sweatpants.  They are more like cargo pajamas - super thin material, but comfy and wearable.  If you want some lightweight cargo pants with a drawstring to hold them up, then these are for you!

These cargo pants are so comfortable and match with many my outfits, it’s lightweight and perfect for colder weathers also. you can put them into the washing machine without worrying about anything happening to them or them becoming wrinkly

评论概述: Nice Fit, Not Super Baggy-Lightweight, Good Length..
评论详情: Obviously these were ordered for the husband and he says they’re comfortable, the material is nice because it’s lightweight and not too thick or very heavy. The material is decent quality, too. They aren't scratchy or stiff. Good sizing, not too baggy and good length. They fit pretty true to size and the drawstrings make it easy to adjust so there’s really no reason to size up or down. I think he looks good in them, as well. So for the price, I think they’re a decent deal.

My son really liked these. They fit true to size but have a nice loose and baggy look to them that he enjoy. The bottom of the legs can be pulled tight to adjust for the persons height and the rest can fold over the tightened part. The little snap button flaps on the side pockets don’t actually snap anywhere it’s just for looks. The pockets are all spacious.

These are thin and light pants that are great for lounging around the house or even flying. I got these for a long haul flight and they are very comfortable and you barely know you have them on. Like the drawstring with elastic as they fit nice and I wear a 36 inseam and they are long enough. Material is slick but comfortable and easy on you skin. Have plenty of pockets for storage. Made well with no string or loose ends. Great lazy man pants.

These men's casual cargo pants are a great addition to any wardrobe, offering both comfort and functionality. The material is lightweight yet durable, ideal for warmer weather or layering in cooler temperatures. They wash well and maintain their shape, which is always a plus. I would recommend these pants to anyone looking for a reliable pair of casual bottoms.

评论概述: Do I Have To Take Them Off?
评论详情: I’m smitten. These nice looking cargo pants showed up right after dinner, so I didn’t really pay much attention to them when they came. But when I looked at them the next morning, I was very happy with what I got. In fact, I wore them for three days straight! The polyester material is thin and incredibly comfortable. You get five pockets; they are all pretty big, especially the ones on the legs. The seams are done very well with no loose threads and there is drawstring on the pant cuffs so you can adjust the length. The elastic waistband is not overly tight and there is drawstring there for a more perfect fit. I am especially glad that the pant’s legs are slim cut and not big and balloon-y like a lot of these cargo pants.  There are two issues. The pants run a little big, especially in the length of the legs. And as you can see in the online product photos, the leg pockets show that there snaps on either side but they are just decoration; they don’t actually secure the pockets at all. That’s a bit silly, I would say. Neither of these things particularly bothered me, but you might have a different opinion. These comfortable casual cargo pants are an appreciated addition to my summer wardrobe. They might make you happy, too. Highly recommended.

I like these cargo pants. The fabric has some stretch to it. I ordered a size medium and for reference I have a 32 inch waist and i'm 6 feet tall. These fit me well which I am pleasantly surprised about as I didn't think these would look as good as they do.  The side pockets are placed in a flattering way giving my quads a fuller look. I have thick calf muscles but there is enough space from the knee down. I like the drawstrings on the cuffs as you can change the look a little. One small thing I don't like are the tabs on the pockets that just hang down. They have studs on them but no fastenings so they just flap about while you walk. The fabric is lightweight, and the army green color is a classic for this type of pant and works well with classic sneakers and a tee during the summer months.  I haven't washed them yet but hoping they hold out. They weren't expensive and I don't expect they will last for years but I like them enough to want to have them for a good while.
